content.question: The English Question described in the passage was a direct outcome of which of the following?

choices.label: The devolution of powers to subnational units in 1997
The debates over the United Kingdom leaving the European Union (Brexit)
The failures of Tories to combat corruption

content.answer: The devolution of powers to subnational units in 1997

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the author's argument or perspective relates to political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
